featured.text: To prevent the spread of the Ebola virus from West Africa to the rest of the world, many airports have begun Ebola ______ for passengers from the infected areas.
All passengers riding in cars are required to fasten their seatbelts in order to reduce the risk of _____ in case of an accident.
The bus driver often complains about chewing gum found under passenger seats because it is and very hard to remove.
The passengers ______ escaped death when a bomb exploded in the subway station, killing sixty people.

other.text: Most men take off their hats in my car, and sometimes I have to tell passengers to put out their cigarettes.
The angry passengers argued ______ with the airline staff because their flight was cancelled without any reason.

definition.zh_def: 乘客；搭乘交通工具的人。
definition.en_def: A person who travels in a vehicle but is not the driver.
definition.example: The passenger in the back seat asked the driver to take a different route.
